articles.author: Will Ripley, Eric Cheung and Ben Westcott, CNN
articles.title: Taiwan's President says the threat from China is increasing 'every day' and confirms presence of US military trainers on the island - CNN
articles.description: The leader of Taiwan, the island thrust into the center of rising tensions between the United States and China, said the threat from Beijing is growing "every day," as for the first time she confirmed the presence of American troops on Taiwanese soil.
